text: Thamoud my poslaly yikhnʹomu bratu Saaleh. Vin skazav, "O moyi lyudy, obozhnyuyutʹ BOHA; vy ne mayete inshoho boha bilya Yoho. Dokaz ye zabezpechenyy dlya vas z vashoho Lorda: osʹ BOZHYY verblyud, shchob sluzhyty yak znak dlya vas. Dozvolʹte yiy hostytesya z BOZHOYI zemli, ta ne torkayetesya yiyi z budʹ-yakoyu shkodoyu, lest vy zaznayete bolisnoho retribution
